website_summaries.verdict: This is a circular hoe weeder that effectively cuts weeds without damaging nearby plants.
pros: Blade and neck are made of solid steel
Thanks to sharp bottom and dull sides, it can be used amidst valuable plants to weed selectively
cons: A few owners wish the handle were longer for more control and reach

customer_reviews.title: These weeders are the best! I always had trouble getting close to the ...
customer_reviews.text: These weeders are the best! I always had trouble getting close to the base of the plants - I would nick or cut the stems if I got too close, but if you can't get right up to the base, you will have weeds growing there. I learned about these hoes from a person who used to supervise groundskeeping at Disneyland, where they use them to perfectly groom their amazing flower beds. They are fairly expensive for a hoe, but you will have it forever, and you will wonder what you ever did without it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool. It takes out the weed like a large hoe but without having to stand up or take out a ton of dirt around it. The size and design makes it easy to work in between plants. Also, depending on your method, you can either cut the weed at the root or pull the weed (root and all) out. I hesitated buying it for a few days because it seemed a bit pricey; however it is super strong and the handle is solid wood and very comfortable to hold. This little tool appears it will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: DIYGIRL

customer_reviews.title: My favorite tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my previous circle hoe, my favorite tool. Best gardening tool ever! It is tough enough to dig roots out of hard soil but shaped so you can carefully dig weeds out of soft soil right next to your seedlings. This is the only tool I need in my garden 90% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've been gardening for more than 30 years at home, church and in my community.Truly the best hand gardening tools that I have ever used. I could not believe how easy and accurate the circular hoe is. You won't be disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Garden Tool out There!
customer_reviews.text: I began using the Circle Hoe when I received one for a gift several years ago, and it was the best designed gardening tool that I ever had used. When I saw the Carrot design circular hoe, I was so excited because the Circle Hoe was no longer being sold for some reason. This Garden tool can do just about everything. I use it to dig holes to plant flowers, dig up weeds and just dig in the dirt ! I definitely plan to buy more of these for my friends, because it is the absolute best designed garden tool!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: At last - a weeding solution!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to pull out the zillions of teeny weeds that grow overnight between rows or clumps of my desired plants. I was losing the race before - now I can at least stay even. Gets the weeds effectively and is harrmless to adjacent plants. Comfortable to hold in my hand and well-made. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The Carrot.
customer_reviews.text: The “Carrot” was just delivered, and I’m sure I will love it! Many years ago as a child I helped my grandparents garden. When My Grandfather handed me a “tool” that he said was sized for a little girl, I remember it looking surprisingly like the circular hand tool I just received. I have no way of knowing what happened to that tool, but often thought how well it worked removing weeds. Amazing design. I’ll follow up with another review after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Gardener

customer_reviews.title: This may be the simpliest - best tool ever
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a hand held hula hoe. This thing looked like it might work. When I got it I was totally stunned at how strong it was. It's heavy and really well made, thick steel. The inside edge is beveled to a degree of sharpness, you know, for a hoe. Works like a charm. Easy to get in and around plants and get out weeds that would have been a real pain with any larger hoe. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Wood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about buying a hand tool that cost a bit more than others but I am really glad I chose this one. The construction is very sturdy. Top notch! It works exactly like what I wanted the tool for. A friend commented on my weed-free garden the other day. It is because I have a Hula hoe and this hand held Carrot brand hoe. Great tools.
customer_reviews.author: MondaysTuesday

customer_reviews.title: Are you a raised bed gardener? If so, you need this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second circle hoe that I have gifted, because they are that awesome. I have had mine for roughly 10-years, and it is by far the easiest way to weed a raised bed that has rows of veggies, pressed together. This purchase was part of a Mother's Day gift, and my mom has been over the moon with hers, as well. There are no cons to this item. Just get one!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: It's to dull.......
customer_reviews.text: I bought one ...tried it to find it didn't cut the weeds....it just dragged them along defeating the entire concept. I returned it but must have made a mistake because they sent me a replacement. I sent the replace back and again must have made a mistake because they never returned the money. Oh well "s--t happens".
customer_reviews.author: Peter Fons

customer_reviews.title: This almost makes we want to weed! good size for raised beds or gardening by sitting
customer_reviews.text: This almost makes we want to weed! Still waiting for Spring, but it looks like you hold it with the "ring" pointing down, so the sharpened edge is in contact with the soil and roots of weeds. Good length for sitting and weeding my 3 ft high x 4 ft wide raised beds.
customer_reviews.author: TAM

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool, get one.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic weeder, better than another one I have that has a different shape to it. I have weeds that spread in a mass together in my vegetable garden and this Circular Hoe, pulls them out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Melsha

customer_reviews.title: The best weeder you will ever buy
customer_reviews.text: We have had versions of these Circle Hoes in our gardens for years, they simply work. They are one of the easiest to use tools you can ever buy for weeding. The design allows you to get into small space and between plants with minimal disruption to the surroundings. If you do not own one you should, if you do own one and know someone who doesn't buy them one. If you don't garden, why not start.
customer_reviews.author: Dorkus Malorkus

customer_reviews.title: Best Tool You Can Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! I've been gardening for years and this is the best weeder I've ever used. The design is perfectly suited to the task. Negotiates well around other plants.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool for raised beds.
customer_reviews.text: MIGardener recommended this and I know why. It is my go-to weeding tool for all of my plants now. This thing makes it effortless. If you like getting close to your plants and like to be lazy/efficient with gardening, you need this.
customer_reviews.author: RandomNerdGuy

customer_reviews.title: The BEST gardening tool
customer_reviews.text: I can easily get under flowering plants to get out even the most stubborn weeds without disrupting the plant. I do have tools (files) to keep the cutting edge sharp. Can't imagine anyone who orders one would be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great feel.
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel of this tool and I think it will work wonderfully in my garden the way it's supposed to but when I ordered it it was winter. I am really looking forward to using it next summer maybe I'll remember to write another review or update this
customer_reviews.author: Nkleckner

customer_reviews.title: Sharp as a nickel
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm just used to Japanese tools that have a great edge but this thing was useless. It's so dull that it could only cultivate soil that you could probably stir with your fingers. Returned
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: Please do yourself a favor, get this tool. If you a serious gardener no regrets. There is no comparison and very well made.I paid $24 and must say it will last 10+ years. The biggest plus its a huge time saver. When I used mine I noticed how gentle and precise this thing is. Also if it where to brake get lost or stolen, will without hesitation going to get another. I grew up using the Hula Hoe great tool also but I got to have this one.
customer_reviews.author: BASENJI

customer_reviews.title: Well built, handle a little small, needs sharpened, works great.
customer_reviews.text: A well made tool. The handle needs a little more girth for me (Men's L-XL gloves) which caused a little hand cramping after a while. I will probably be building up the handle with some sports tape because the function is great. I weeded 70 sg ft of closely planted onions with lots of lambsquarter and pigweed seedlings in about 30 min. One star off of ease of use because it needs to be sharpened a bit before I dok too much with it.
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not as long as I thought. Check dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and the dimensions were readily visible. However if it were a foot taller I could use it standing instead of bent over. I did have a friend sharpen the little sharp edge a smidge more. It does do a nice job of cutting whatever is inside the circle with little or no damage to what's outside the little circle.
customer_reviews.author: Happy_knitter

customer_reviews.title: Took me a while to figure out
customer_reviews.text: This tool took me a while to figure out how best to use it. Once I did it is my go to weeding tool. Can not say enough positive things about it.
customer_reviews.author: E Gray

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite weeder. It's small enough to be easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite weeder. It's small enough to be easy to manage and I like the how easy it is to use near plants that I don't want to harm. The tool is extremely well made and I expect it to last for a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: jawhite

customer_reviews.title: Go to for weeding
customer_reviews.text: Makes getting rid of weeks around plants in the garden a breeze. Light weight, fits in hammer pocket of my overalls where it is readily available.
customer_reviews.author: MKH

customer_reviews.title: Raised garden weeder
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this all summer. The more I use it the more I like it. Perfect for small garden. Gets close to good plants and cuts the bad ones at the roots.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia70

customer_reviews.title: Cant weed ariund delicate new plants without it.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite weeding tool; it is great for weeding close to a plant without risking cutting it off. I had a house fire and this is the first tool I thought of replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little tool.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised how well the tool worked around vegetable plants. It is able to quickly dig out grass and small weeds. And able to get up close to plants with precision.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: The handle and the shaft separated immediately without using it ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle and the shaft separated immediately without using it, the tool isn't sharp enough and the part that was "sharpened" is only a small area. I repaired the handle with gorilla glue and am going to work on sharpening it as a challenge, are the two reasons I am not returning this. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This tool supplements a large scuffle hoe and allows me to get closer to the plants I want to keep. Much easier than hand weeding.
customer_reviews.author: ktmom

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: They don’t make them like this anymore ! So sturdy and a great length for weeding on my knees or sitting on a stool! My grandparents are happy to have this for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: MrsBrown

customer_reviews.title: Your most important tool when plants are young
customer_reviews.text: The only tool better for scraping away weeds from young plants or seedlings is an un-gloved fingernail. Then good luck cleaning your nails!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Galante

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: The cutting design is ideal for the purpose, and I really like the handle, which is a comfortable design and well sanded and finished. Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: lovetogift

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool. It is my favorite garden tool. Work’s like a dream. Weeding is no fun but this tool makes it a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: char h

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for anyone who enjoys flower gardening
customer_reviews.text: We purchased one circular hoe and we’re so satisfied we ordered a second on! It’s a great garden tool for cleaning up small weeds in the flowerbeds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Logston

customer_reviews.title: Handy addition to my garden tool set
customer_reviews.text: This is great for weeding around other (desirable) plants. Other tools are made for large open spaces of ground.
customer_reviews.author: Neal R. Mielke

customer_reviews.title: Great for weeding
customer_reviews.text: Saw someone use this tool when visiting a local garden. Bought one for my use. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: B&M

customer_reviews.title: I liked my hand hoe better
customer_reviews.text: I liked my hand hoe better. this didn't work as well as I hoped it would. it was pretty expensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Comello

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: it's just such a handy tool, myself I use mainly in containers for weed control but will work anywhere especially in close quarters
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dungan

customer_reviews.title: After weeding a LONG row of carrots for her & finding out how easy it was
customer_reviews.text: A friend raved about your circle hoe & had me try it in her garden. After weeding a LONG row of carrots for her & finding out how easy it was, I came home & ordered two! Amazing & so easy! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Mullady

customer_reviews.title: She really likes it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife really loves the tool; and in the past someone made a tour just like that except with a long handle. Is there any chance you might make it to her like that?
customer_reviews.author: Craig Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I used this around my roses and to mix in the dirt with food, coffee grounds... Great little tool!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: circle hoe review
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 previous "circle hoes" years ago and really loved them until they went missing. Found this one and ordered it up. While it is very similar, it is larger and heavier and not really made for my small hands. I know I'll still get a lot of use from it, just wish it was a bit smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Baker

customer_reviews.title: One hoe to rule them all
customer_reviews.text: This has very quickly become an indispensable tool. It earned a special, easy-access, hook in my shed and everything.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Furst

customer_reviews.title: Must have tool!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used one of these before now and was a little sceptical about buying it. Now that I’ve used it for a day I love it. Wish I’d bought one years ago. I’m slowly learning that the right tools make gardening so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was okay, but not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Not real sure what to think. Sometimes great but I think cow manure is not it's thing. But really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hayhooker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for raised beds
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as expected and it high quality - a good heft to it. Excellent tool for raised beds
customer_reviews.author: Marion Kitt

customer_reviews.title: I do like the concept and am anxious to use be it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to send an email to address included on the note of use however the email bounced. I wanted to know if they could produce a version with a long handle so I could stand and use. I do like the concept and am anxious to use be it on my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Askew

customer_reviews.title: Handy for in tight weeding
customer_reviews.text: Maybe not for everyone, but for weeding in close when not much space, it does the job just fine for me! It does what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: David McCracken

customer_reviews.title: I have a small Circular Hoe that I really like. This large size Hoe is too heavy for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a small Circular Hoe that I really like. This large size Hoe is too heavy for my hand tool.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool for getting between the plants! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A. Kauma

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It really does pull up weeds in short order! I thought I was ordering something with a bigger diameter but it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn M.

customer_reviews.title: it worked great. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I used it this morning in the garden. It took a bit to find my comfort spot with the handle but once I did, it worked great. I am very pleased, thank you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The cutting edge could be a little sharper.
customer_reviews.author: valleyman

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I like this tool, but its a little heavy for me, but not for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the garden.
customer_reviews.text: I have a hoe just like it and wanted another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weeder
customer_reviews.text: Easy to reach around and underneath plants to get seedlings.
customer_reviews.author: jfair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this tool enthusiastically. Gets weeds close to other important small plants. I give it for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma

customer_reviews.title: We love them.
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth one and I bought one for my son-in -law. We love them. Yet again, I ordered for my neighbor who loved it. They are the best gardener gifts! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.  Very comfortable in your hand
customer_reviews.text: I use this to for weeding. Made weeding so easy. Love this tool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hand held hoe
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand; well weighted; excellent at pulling weeds
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne G. Frisch

customer_reviews.title: Great priduct.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that makes weeding much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This circle garden hoe is perfect for weeding around my garden plants!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Dahling

customer_reviews.title: Great tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this weeding tool! It's been a godsend in my greenhouse, where I'm growing tomatoes, basil, peppers and eggplants. I used to use my winged weeder there, but would sometimes damage the plants with the sharp ends. This gets rid of that problem - and the weeds!
customer_reviews.author: lbrookeh

customer_reviews.title: USA Made but
customer_reviews.text: This item is for our daughter but I inspected it when it arrived. It is just steel bent into a circle not well shaped and looked like it would not do much Sorry to see a made in USA not up to shape
customer_reviews.author: Arnold J goodman

customer_reviews.title: It is excellent for reaching those hard to get to places like ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for this hoe! It is excellent for reaching those hard to get to places like under the rose bushes. I was so happy to find it that I ordered one for my sister too! Good tool, I love it~
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Ennis

customer_reviews.title: Great Garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: The circular hoe is my favorite garden tool! I had used a similar one for many years and missed it when it broke. Found this one and am just as pleased. It has an edge on one side of the hoe that allows me to weed between plants and cultivate the soil without disturbing plants. It has longer handle than my other hoe, which is a plus! I would recommend the Carrot Design Circular hoe.
customer_reviews.author: SJMira

customer_reviews.title: Works best in prepared beds. Not for cutting sod.
customer_reviews.text: Like the way it cuts. Wish it had a longer handle version.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Every Gardner needs this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a most useful hand held garden tool. It is the ultimate for quick and easy weed extermination without damaging seedlings. It is a highly manoeuvrable hoe which is highly effective and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bling 123

product_meta.title: Carrot Design Circular Hoe Hand Garden Weeding Tool
product_meta.description: If you've never tried a circular hoe hand weeder and cultivator, you are in for a treat. Makes weeding by hand much easier as you use the pointed end to drag at ground level and cut off weeds at the roots. Super strong solid steel shank and blade with beech hardwood handle. Circle shape of the hoe with sharpened edge lets you pull the tool through the soil to cut weeds and loosen the soil without making a big mess or creating piles of dirt. Edge is sharp on the bottom only, so it cuts roots under the ground. All other edges are rounded, so it won't hurt nearby plants that you want to keep.
feature_bullets: Solid steel blade and neck. Innovative design of circular hoe weeder makes weeding by hand easy. Also cultivates the soil without moving it around -- it passes through the circle.
Drag at ground level to cut weeds at the roots. Bottom is sharp and sides are dull, so you can use it near important plants and only cut weeds. See graphic in the photos for more information.
14.5 inches long, wooden handle is 7.5 inches, steel shank is 4.5 inches, actual blade has a 2.5 inch diameter
Beech hardwood handle. A hand weeding tool that you'll alway use because it works so well.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars125 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
